name: Katakiuchi Unchained
description:
TAKE BLOOD. TAKE REVENGE.

Welcome to the Gang. Fight your way through enemy lines in a wonderful zen garden and still your blood lust. A rival gang of traditional samurai assassinated your gang and now you´re out for revenge. Take the fight to their home and slice them in half. Infiltrate the enemy zen garden, eliminate your enemies and take revenge.

Controls

"Katakiuchi Unchained" is a semester project produced by 8 students from the Games Academy in one semester. It is free, so make sure you grab it!
